definition: a hoe/to hoe or dig/to weed/to get rid of
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: In this way, it might be possible to turn shields—instead of swords—into plowshares .
sentences.chinese: 也許可以把防禦用的盾牌變成鋤頭。

sentences.english: He threw his hoe away and lay by the tree every day, dreaming for more rabbits to come.
sentences.chinese: 他扔掉鋤頭，每天躺在樹邊，夢想有兔子來。

sentences.english: They walked to their fields with hoes on their shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 他們扛着鋤頭往地裏走。

sentences.english: The old farmer walked towards the field, hoe on shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 這位老農民肩扛鋤頭朝田裏走去。

sentences.english: Hoes are great gardening tools for chopping up weeds and uprooting plants.
sentences.chinese: 鋤頭是砍雜草和植物連根拔起大園藝工具。

sentences.english: They left for the fields, shouldering spades and hoes.
sentences.chinese: 他們扛起鐵鍬和鋤頭就下地了。

sentences.english: Use trash cans to store shovels, hoes and rakes.
sentences.chinese: 使用垃圾桶來存儲鏟，鋤頭和耙。

sentences.english: He taught me how to use the long and sharp hoe,how to distinguish the materials.
sentences.chinese: 他教我如何使用那長長的尖鋤頭，如何辨認藥材。

sentences.english: He bought all the gardening utensils he needed, including spades and hoes.
sentences.chinese: 他購置了所需的全部園藝工具，包括鐵鍬和鋤頭。

sentences.english: On the first day, shouldering a spade and a basket, I followed the villagers to the riverbeds.
sentences.chinese: 第一天，我拿了鋤頭和土筐跟着村裏的人下了河牀。

sentences.english: Although the famous courtesan contain lord, the hoe head is heartless.
sentences.chinese: 名花雖有主，鋤頭卻無情。

sentences.english: Let me weed the ground with a hoe.
Also some people with sorghum stalks do two hoe in rice.
sentences.chinese: 也有的人家用高粱秸做兩把鋤頭插在飯上。

sentences.english: He called his sons, and hoe in hand they began to dig up these MMs with great determination.
sentences.chinese: 愚公下決心率領他的兒子們要用鋤頭泡到這兩個美眉。

sentences.english: Forget the hoes and wheelbarrows, but bring a radio.
sentences.chinese: 忘了鋤頭與手推車吧，不過記得帶收音機。

sentences.english: The village purchased some hoes directly from the farming implement plant.
sentences.chinese: 村裏直接從農機具製造廠購進了一些鋤頭。

definition: to heave/to lift/to raise up/to uphold
to raise one's head/to perk up
hammer/to hammer into shape/weight (e.g. of a steelyard or balance)/to strike with a hammer
